description: The capital city of the Arabasta Kingdom, built on a plateau near an oasis in the northeastern part of the kingdom. Site of major battles during the civil war.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs Mr. 2 Battle
keyEvents.description: The streets of Alubarna serve as the battleground for the intense fight between Sanji and Mr. 2 Bon Clay.
keyEvents.significance: One of the major officer battles taking place across the capital during the civil war.

keyEvents.title: Nami Pursued Through the Streets
keyEvents.description: Mr. 1 and Miss Doublefinger chase Nami through the streets of Alubarna while Zoro searches for her.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the upcoming battles between Zoro vs Mr. 1 and Nami vs Miss Doublefinger.

statusHistory.status: Active - Under siege during civil war

notableFeatures: Built on a plateau near an oasis
Contains the royal palace at its center
Site of the final battles of the Arabasta civil war

description: The royal palace of Arabasta Kingdom, located at the center of Alubarna. Features luxuries including a lush rooftop garden and secret passageways.

keyEvents.title: Vivi Orders Palace Destruction
keyEvents.description: Princess Vivi makes the difficult decision to destroy the palace, ordering it to be loaded with gunpowder as a signal to unite the warring armies.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Vivi's willingness to sacrifice the kingdom's greatest symbol to save her people.

keyEvents.title: Crocodile Arrives with King Cobra
keyEvents.description: Crocodile appears at the palace with the kidnapped King Cobra, interrupting Vivi's plan.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a critical confrontation that will determine the fate of Arabasta.

statusHistory.status: Occupied - Vivi and Chaka preparing for destruction

notableFeatures: Symbol of the Arabasta royal family
Target for destruction to signal both armies
